posts.title: GitHub删除所有提交历史
posts.excerpt: 效果将代码保持在当前状态，清空commit history。 思路创建新分支 -> 将文件添加到新分支 -> 提交更改 -> 删除旧master分支 -> 重命名新分支 -> 强制更新仓库 步骤
posts.text: 效果将代码保持在当前状态，清空commit history。 思路创建新分支 -> 将文件添加到新分支 -> 提交更改 -> 删除旧master分支 -> 重命名新分支 -> 强制更新仓库 步骤 创建新分支 1git checkout --orphan latest_branch 将文件添加到新分支 1git add -A 提交更改 1git commit -am "Init new branch" 删除旧master分支 1git branch -D master 重命名新分支 1git branch -m master 强制更新仓库 1git push -f origin master

posts.title: Hello World
posts.excerpt: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
